subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Women)
organizations: State University of New York at Stony Brook
lead_paragraph: St. John’s cut Duke’s lead to four points in the second half, but the Blue Devils responded with a 14-2 run and won, 80-71.
snippet: St. John’s cut Duke’s lead to four points in the second half, but the Blue Devils responded with a 14-2 run and won, 80-71.
